question_text: Which two characteristics describe resistive touchscreens? (Select two)
answer_options: Require finger or conductive object to work
Respond to any pressure, including gloved touch
Do not register input from styluses
correct_answer: Require finger or conductive object to work
Respond to any pressure, including gloved touch
explanation: Resistive screens work by pressure and can be used with fingers, styluses, or gloves â€” unlike capacitive types.
